local_intent: Reacquire t_block if needed, then approach and align to prepare for the fine push with yaw at 90°.
assumptions: Yaw was previously set to 90° and should be verified before the fine push.
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer phase between long and fine push: perceive -> ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.005, 1200 ms) -> verify AtOrientation 90°.
